Name: NLC
Description: National Location Code

Name: TLC
Description: Three Letter Code; sourced from National Rail

Name: name
Description: Name of Station

Name: x_lon
Description: The longitude of the station (WGS84)

Name: y_lat
Description: The latitude of the station (WGS84)

Name: Easting
Description: The Easting reference for the station, using the Ordnance Survey (OS) grid. Sourced from NAPTAN (2016).

Name: Northing
Description: The Northing reference for the station, using the Ordnance Survey (OS) grid. Sourced from NAPTAN (2016).

Name: facility_owner
Description: The company that owns the station (as of last year)

Name: PTE_urban_area
Description: The station is within a urban area covered by PTE services

Name: is_london_travelcard
Description: The station is within a urban area covered by TfL services

Name: NRR
Description: High level Network Rail route associated with the station

Name: SRS
Description: Strategic Route Section code associated with the station

Name: SRSn
Description: Strategic Route Section name associated with the station

Name: is_request_stop
Description: Indicates if the stations is only on request

Name: started_at
Description: First year of data collection

Name: xxxx_Full
Description: Estimated count of E&E using a full price ticket

Name: xxxx_Reduced
Description: Estimated count of E&E using a reduced price ticket

Name: xxxx_Season
Description: Estimated count of E&E using a season ticket

Name: xxxx_Total
Description: Estimated Total E&E made at the station

Name: xxxx_Changes
Description: Estimated total number of interchanges made at the station

Name: xxxx_Rank
Description: Rank of the Total E&E

Name: xxxx_VarYoY
Description: Percentage change in Total E&E between xxxx and the previous year

Name: xxxx_var5Ys
Description: Average Percentage change in Total E&E over the period between xxxx and  five years earlier

Name: xxxx_had_large_var
Description: Indicates if the station has had a YoY change in Total E&E of more than |10|%/|25|% for large/small stations

Name: xxxx_size
Description: Indicates if the station is Small (<10K Total E&E, as of last recorded year), Medium (btw 10K and K) or Large (>K)
